subject: doritos
body:
i'm thankful for how much miso enjoys getting her scalp massaged when she is in the right mood.

i'm thankful that instead of a weed tolerance break i just chose a different strain and that still worked.

i'm thankful that i did not eat all the flaming hot nacho cheese doritos, i merely misplaced the bag.
